body:
Syntax: cast 'fly' <target>

Fly grants the target the ability to fly, allowing movement over water
and other terrain that would normally be impassable. Flying characters
also gain advantages in combat positioning.

Classes: Mage, Sorcerer
Level: 10 (Mage), 15 (Sorcerer)
Mana Cost: 15
Duration: 24 hours
Position: Standing or Fighting

This spell can be cast on yourself or others. Flying is essential for
exploring certain areas and provides tactical advantages in battle.

See Also: WATERWALK, GROUP FLY
